Core Components

1. Omnivaults / Omnistrategies
Smart vaults that route liquidity to the most yield-efficient pools across chains, dynamically rebalancing based on live data .
2. AI Agent Intents
Designed for multiple DeFi use cases:
TULP: Trustless Uniswap liquidity provisioning https://t.co/QMDobxsmyh

Step Three ‚Äì Choose a DEX (Decentralized Exchange)
Go to a DEX like Uniswap, PancakeSwap, or https://t.co/4HvUGuRRZ0 and connect your wallet.
üü¢ No registration. No KYC. Just connect and start.

I‚Äôve seen people lose more money via optimism than any rug or hack.

Alpha: risk management is *the* yield multiplier.
